trans-unit.source: Average effort to farm a block in the last 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 过去30天区块平均蓄力值。

trans-unit.source: Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days. Estimated value (XCH) a farmer would get per TiB per day.
trans-unit.target: 基于过去30天出块数据统计的收益，数值为每 1 TiB 农田每天所获得的 XCH 平均数量。

trans-unit.source: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
trans-unit.target: 蓄力值与出块的时间相关，100%表示矿池在预期时间出块，低于 100% 表示矿池在少于预期时间内出块，超过 100% 表示矿池出块时间超出预期。

trans-unit.source: No blocks found by this farmer!
farmer doesn't exist, has left and/or has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 农民不存在，已离开或被移除。

trans-unit.source: Learn how to set name here.

pc.dispStart: <i class="fas fa-info-circle"ngbTooltip="未知状态，因用户加入时间早于此功能上线时间。">

trans-unit.source: Use above link to refer people to this pool. They will be required to join the pool and login to the website to confirm the referral.
trans-unit.target: 使用以上链接来邀请朋友加入， 他需要加入矿池并登录网站以确认邀请。

trans-unit.source: No referrals found for this farmer!
trans-unit.target: 没有找到被邀请人记录！

trans-unit.source: Failed to authenticate! Check your URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: 认证失败！请检查您的URL，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: What are non-portable (OG) and portable plots (NFT)?
trans-unit.target: 旧格式（OG）和新格式（NFT）农田的区别？

trans-unit.source: Can I join a pool with non-portable (OG) plots?
trans-unit.target: 旧格式（OG）农田可以加入矿池吗？

trans-unit.source: Can I switch from/to your pool whenever I want?
trans-unit.target: 我可以只有切换矿池吗？

trans-unit.source: How many portable plots do I need to join the pool?
trans-unit.target: 加入矿池至少需要多少块农田？

trans-unit.source: How to set name in explorer? (alias)
trans-unit.target: 如何设置矿工名称（别名）？

trans-unit.source: Do you have any other questions?
Payouts will happen within 5 minutes of the farmed block. These terms are subjected to change and will be communicated 1 week prior to the change in this website and on Discord channel.
trans-unit.target: 出块后5分钟将启动支付。 此条款若发生变更，将会提前 1 周通过网站和Discord 频道通知。

trans-unit.source: A reward of 1.75 XCH will be distributed to pool farmers, 0 XCH (nothing) is kept to the pool.
trans-unit.target: 1.75 XCH 的奖励将会直接结算给农民，矿池不收任何费用。

trans-unit.source: If a reward of 1.75 XCH is found, only 1% of that, 0.0175 will be kept to the pool as a fee. The remaining 1.7325 XCH will be distributed to pool farmers.
trans-unit.target: 出块后获得的 1.75 XCH，其中的 1% 即0.0175 作为矿池收费，剩下的 1.7325 XCH 将会结算给农民。

trans-unit.source: We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, we look at the valid partials (shares) submitted by all users in the pool since last payout and distribute the reward value based on your share among all farmers in the pool. In our case Last N Shares refers to partials since last payout. We believe this system is far more fair for less frequent rewards (when Last N Shares means only last few hours), since people contributing for more time will get more rewards. Once our estimated time to win gets below 48 hours we plan on changing the Last N Shares to 48 hours of valid partials.
trans-unit.target: 结算方式为 PPLNS （Pay Per Last N Shares）。矿池出块后，系统统计所有用户自上次支付以后提交的有效贡献（份额），并计算你在池中份额在所有农民中的占比来分配奖励。 在我们的系统中，“最后N份额 ”指的是自上次支付以后的份额。我们认为这个规则对于不那么频繁的奖励（当最后N份额指的是最后N个小时）来说要公平得多，因为贡献了更多时间的农民将获得更多的奖励。 一旦矿池的预计出块时间低于48小时，我们计划将最后N份额改为48小时的有效贡献。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you are running official Chia client 1.2.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: 安装最新版本的 Chia 客户端，请确保你的客户端版本为 1.2.0 或以后。

trans-unit.source: Sync your full node and wallet
trans-unit.target: 同步你的全节点和钱包

trans-unit.source: before joining the pool, your node and wallet must be fully synchronized with Chia blockchain
trans-unit.target: 加入矿池之前，你需要确保节点和钱包已完全同步。

trans-unit.source: you are going to need 1 mojo (0.000000000001 XCH) which you can get through our faucet service on Discord channel or through Faucet website:
trans-unit.target: 加入矿池需要 1 mojo （0.000000000001 XCH），你可以到我们Discord 的 faucet 频道或者以下网站免费获取

trans-unit.source: go to the “Pool” tab, and click on “Join the Pool”
trans-unit.target: 选择 “农业合作社” 并点击 “加入农业合作社”

trans-unit.source: choose “Connect to pool” and enter the url: https://pool.openchia.io (exactly, no ending slash) then wait for pool description to appear
trans-unit.target: 选择 “连接到农业合作社”并输入以下地址 https://pool.openchia.io （结尾没有斜杠），等待矿池描述出现

trans-unit.source: click the “Create” button. In the next couple of minutes, the Plot NFT will be created, and it will appear in your “Pool” tab
trans-unit.target: 点击 “创建” 按钮，数分钟后，农田 NFT 将会被创建并显示在农业合作社里。

trans-unit.source: You can now start creating Plots in “Plots” tab using this new Plot NFT to start farming XCH
trans-unit.target: 现在你可以在农田页，使用新的农田 NFT 开垦新的农田

trans-unit.source: Go to "Pool" menu in the left menu
trans-unit.target: 左边菜单中选择 “农业合作社”

trans-unit.source: If you already have a Plot NFT select "Change Pool" then enter https://pool.openchia.io
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经创建了农田 NFT ，选择 “更换农业合作社” 并输入 https://pool.openchia.io

trans-unit.source: All our software is open source.
trans-unit.target: 我们所有的软件均开放源代码。
邀请好友加入可享更低费率。

trans-unit.source: Why wait to get your rewards?
Get your reward as soon as possible.
We have nothing to hide. Full blown explorer and live logs.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何隐藏，你可以查看完整的统计信息和实时日志。

trans-unit.source: Have you asked yourself who are the people running Chia pools? Do you trust them?
trans-unit.target: 您是否知道谁是Chia矿池的管理者？您信任他们吗？

trans-unit.source: We have more than 20 years of combined experience in the software development industry.
trans-unit.target: 我们在软件开发行业有20多年的丰富经验。

trans-unit.source: Please meet our partners, together for a better world.
trans-unit.target: 携手我们的合作伙伴，共创一个更美好的世界。

trans-unit.source: They are offering cutting-edge cryptocurrency technology of today and tomorrow. Vivid Stake Pool allows you to stake in Cardano. If you deposit your Fiat Money on your bank account, you will receive 1-3 % profit per year which will be paid after at least a few months. In Cardano it is the opposite: you receive high profits as high as 5-8 % per year which is paid every 5 days!
trans-unit.target: Vivid Stake Pool允许你对Cardano进行投资，他们能够提供现在和未来的最前沿的加密货币技术。如果你把法币存入银行账户，你将需要几个月才能收到1-3%的年化收益。在Cardano中，情况恰恰相反：每5天你将能获得高达5-8%的年化收益!

trans-unit.source: OpenChia believes that in a future blockchain and cryptocurrency can exist without degrading the environment and helping make the world a better place. We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit Vivid Pool.
trans-unit.target: OpenChia认为未来的区块链和加密货币可以在不破坏环境的情况下存在，并帮助使世界变得更美好。我们相信Chia和Cardano可以共存，帮助实现这一目标。如果你想了解更多关于Cardano或加入一个合法的质押池，请访问 Vivid Pool.

trans-unit.source: Earn XCH by referring your friends to this pool!
trans-unit.target: 邀请您的好友入池，你可以赚取更多 ！

trans-unit.source: Refer your friends to this pool using the URL https://openchia.io?referrer=YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID. Replace YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID with the Launcher ID from your Plot NFT.
trans-unit.target: 使用网址 https://openchia.io?referrer=YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID 邀请你的好友，需将 YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID 替换为你的农田 NFT 中的启动器 ID。

trans-unit.source: Have your friend join the pool and login to the pool website using the Plot NFT login link. He will confirm you are his referrer. (Referrer is filled automatically if he visited the website with your link)
trans-unit.target: 让你的好友加入矿池并使用农田 NFT 登录链接登录到网站，确认你是他的邀请人 (如果他使用你的链接访问网站，邀请人ID将会自动填写)

trans-unit.source: You will receive 20% of the pool fee for every payment made to your friend. That value comes out of the pool and not from your friend reward!
trans-unit.target: 矿池每向你的好友支付一笔款项，你将获得此笔付款的矿池手续费的20%。奖金来自于矿池，而不是来自你的好友所获得的收益!

trans-unit.source: How do I check my referrals?
Login to the pool website using your Plot NFT login link and go to the "Referrals" tab.
trans-unit.target: 使用农田NFT 登录链接登录，然后转到“邀请”选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Use of good faith and don't refer yourself in any shape or form.
trans-unit.target: 保持诚信，不要以任何形式进行自我邀请。

trans-unit.source: Do not attempt close loop of referral. e.g. A -> B -> C -> A.
trans-unit.target: 不要循环推荐，例如 A -> B -> C -> A.

trans-unit.source: We reserve the right to change fees for new referrals at any time.
trans-unit.target: 我们保留随时更改邀请奖励的权利。

trans-unit.source: Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎使用这些平台与我们交流。

trans-unit.source: Email may be used to contact you for any issues identified with your launcher or changes in our Terms of Service.
trans-unit.target: 您的启动器发现的任何问题或我们的服务条款的更改将通过电子邮件与您联系。

trans-unit.source: Your launcher will not receive payments until the unpaid balance hits this minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 在未付余额达到此最小值之前，您的启动器将不会收到付款。

trans-unit.source: Before joining pool, your node and wallet must be fully synchronized with Chia blockchain.
trans-unit.target: 在加入矿池之前，您的节点和钱包必须与 Chia 区块链完全同步。

trans-unit.source: If you have an email configured you will receive a notification if your launcher stops sending partials for more than one hour.
trans-unit.target: 如果您配置了电子邮件，如果您的启动器停止发送部分内容超过一小时，您将收到通知。

trans-unit.source: Send a notification on payments. Only works if you have a minimum payout set.
trans-unit.target: 发送付款通知。 仅当您设置了最低支出时才有效。

trans-unit.source: Send a notification if the farm size has dropped significantly within a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 如果农场大小在一段时间内显著下降，则发送通知。

trans-unit.source: Configure the difficulty for your farm so it can send less or more partials.
trans-unit.target: 为您的农场配置难度，以便它可以发送更少或更多的部分。

trans-unit.source: Default - Around 600 partials sent per day
trans-unit.target: 缺省-每天大约发送600个部分

trans-unit.source: Lowest - Double of partials sent per day
trans-unit.target: 最低-每天发送两倍部分
在此处显示 Chia 官方说明

trans-unit.source: farmer doesn't exist, has left and/or has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 农民不存在，离开或/被移出.

trans-unit.source: Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days, based on your farm space.
trans-unit.target: 盈利能力基于过去 30 天耕种的区块，基于您的农场空间。

trans-unit.source: Farmer took too long to validate the partial proof of space. Make sure your proof of space lookups are fast, and network connectivity is good. Response must happen in less than 25 seconds. Your NAS or network farming can be an issue. This happens when your disks are in use (plotting) or when waking up.
trans-unit.target: 农民花了太长时间来验证空间的部分证明。 确保您的空间查找证明速度很快，并且网络连接良好。 响应必须在 25 秒内发生。 您的 NAS 或网络农场可能是个问题。 当您的磁盘正在使用（绘图）或唤醒时会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Same partial proof was sent more than once.
trans-unit.target: 同一个部分的证明发送超过一次

trans-unit.source: Signage point is invalid or was not found in pool's node blockchain.
trans-unit.target: 标志点无效或在池的节点区块链中找不到。

trans-unit.source: The proof sent is not good enough for the current difficulty of the farmer.
trans-unit.target: 发送的证明对于农民目前的难度来说还不够好。

trans-unit.source: Plot NFT (pool smart contract) no longer in the pool. Farmer left the pool.
trans-unit.target: 地块 NFT（矿池智能合约）不在矿池中。 农夫离开了矿池。

trans-unit.source: Failed to authenticate! Check your URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: 认证失败！ 检查您的网址，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: Use above link to refer people to this pool. They will be required to join the pool and login to the website to confirm the referral.
trans-unit.target: 使用上面的链接将人们推荐给这个矿池。 他们需要加入矿池并登录网站以确认推荐。

trans-unit.source: No referrals found for this farmer!
We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, each farmer will receive the share correspondent of the last 24 hours of partials sent to the pool.
trans-unit.target: 我们采用PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) 制度分配奖励. 当一个区块获胜，每个农民都将得到过去24小时内发送到矿池部分的相应分配比例。

trans-unit.source: What are non-portable (OG) and portable plots (NFT)?
trans-unit.target: 什么是非便携式 (OG) 和便携式地块 (NFT)？

trans-unit.source: Make sure you are using official Chia client supporting pool plots (1.2.0 or later).
trans-unit.target: 确保您使用支持矿池地块的官方 Chia 客户端（1.2.0 或更高版本）。

trans-unit.source: Can I join a pool with non-portable (OG) plots?
trans-unit.target: 我是否可以用非便携地块（OG）加入矿池？

trans-unit.source: Can I switch from/to your pool whenever I want?
trans-unit.target: 我是否随时可以切换进/出你们的矿池？

trans-unit.source: How many portable plots do I need to join the pool?
trans-unit.target: 加入矿池我需要多少便携地块？

trans-unit.source: How to set name in explorer? (alias)
trans-unit.target: 如何在浏览器设置名称？（昵称）

trans-unit.source: Do you have any other questions?
Currently we charge 1% fee. If a reward of 1.75 XCH is found, only 1% of that, 0.0175 will be kept to the pool as a fee. The remaining 1.7325 XCH will be distributed to pool farmers.
trans-unit.target: 目前我们收取1%费用，如果发现得到奖励1.75 XCH，仅仅支付1%，即0.0175 XCH给矿池作为费用。 剩余1.7325 XCH 将分配给矿池中所有农民。

trans-unit.source: You are going to need 1 Mojo (0.000000000001 XCH) which you can get through our faucet services
trans-unit.target: 您将需要 1 个 Mojo (0.000000000001 XCH)，您可以通过我们的水龙头服务获得

trans-unit.source: Depending on your location, use one of the following connections
trans-unit.target: 根据您所在的位置，使用以下连接之一

trans-unit.source: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
trans-unit.target: 耕种该区块所需的时间。 100% 是预计获胜的预计时间。 低于 100% 意味着我们提前赢得区块。 高于 100% 意味着我们花费的时间比预期的要长。

trans-unit.source: No blocks found by this farmer!
View is based on a snapshot of today's XCH price, a pool luck and a constant total network space. Plots of size k=32 (101.4 GiB).
trans-unit.target: 视图基于当天 XCH 价格、矿池运气和恒定的总网络空间。 地块大小为 k=32 (101.4 GiB) 的图。

trans-unit.source: Average effort to farm a block in the last 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 过去30天耕种单块平均付出

trans-unit.source: Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days. Estimated value (XCH) a farmer would get per TiB per day.
trans-unit.target: 盈利基于过去 30 天耕种的区块。 农民每天每 TiB 可获得的估计值 (XCH)。

trans-unit.source: Pool space when the block has been won.

The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
trans-unit.target: 耕种该块所需的时间。 100% 是预计获胜的预计时间。 低于 100% 意味着我们在提前赢得区块。 高于 100% 意味着我们花费的时间比预期的要长。

trans-unit.source: Learn how to set name here.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何在此设置名称.

trans-unit.source: Payouts will happen within 5 minutes of the farmed block. These terms are subjected to change and will be communicated 1 week prior to the change in this website and on Discord channel.
trans-unit.target: 支付将在耕种到区块的 5 分钟内发生。 这些条款可能会发生变化，并将在更改前 1 周在本网站和 Discord 频道上公告。
